Events that occurred on 18 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1857 - Father Francis, caretaker and "second father" of J.R.R. Tolkien, is born.
1934 - J.R.R. Tolkien's poem "Looney" is published in The Oxford Magazine.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 55.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 95.
1948 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to J.L.N. O'Loughlin.
1948 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes to Rosemary
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Justin Arundale.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 319a.
2010 - Mirkwood: A Novel About JRR Tolkien is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothlórien.
Saruman hears of the Fellowship of the Ring and sends a company led by Uglúk to intercept them.
